abilities.name: Leader's Conviction
abilities.description:
Your damage reduction from Toughness is shared with all allies for 12 seconds.
While Leader's Conviction is active you deal 15% increased damage.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Measured Strike
abilities.description:
Deal 113% Strength damage to target enemy.
Generates 1 Combo Point.

abilities.name: Power Strike
abilities.description:
Deal 142% Strength damage to target.
Generates 2 Combo Points.

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.description:
Deals 265% Strength damage to your target and 26.5% Strength damage to other enemies near your target.
Shield Slam generates 20% Toughness.
TOUGHNESS
Toughness is displayed as a bar to the right of your character. The more Toughness you have, the less damage you take.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge a target enemy, causing 120% Strength damage and Stunning them for 1.5 sec.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description:
Taunt the target, forcing it to attack you for 6 sec.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description:
Interrupt the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec.
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Shield Throw
abilities.description:
Throw your shield at target enemy dealing 207% Strength damage. The shield will bounce to up to 4 additional nearby enemies.
Generates 1 Combo Point per target hit.

abilities.name: Shields Up
abilities.description:
Raise your shield, increasing your Toughness by 65% and increasing your Block chance by 25% for 8 sec.
Each time you succesfully Block an attack, you generate 4% Toughness.
TOUGHNESS
Toughness is displayed as a bar to the right of your character. The more Toughness you have, the less damage Helena takes.

Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Slam sword and shield together creating a shockwave, dealing 411% Strength damage and slowing their movement speed by 90%. The slow is reduced by 10% every 1 second for 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description:
Deals 133% Strength damage to your target and other nearby enemies.
Enemies hit by Sweeping Strike bleed for 162% Strength damage over 18 seconds.

abilities.name: Chain Pull
abilities.description: Throw a chained spearhead at target enemy, dealing 100% Strength damage and pulling them to you.

abilities.name: Iron Wall
abilities.description:
Your Toughness can not be reduced for 8 seconds.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Battle Command
abilities.description:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.
Nearby allies gain 25% Movement Speed.

name: Helena
description:
Despite being weighed down by full plate armor, Helena is always ready to charge into the fray to protect her companions.

Helena is a Melee Tank that uses Builder/Spender Mechanics. She excels in the front lines taking hits instead of her allies.

Using Combo Points, Helena can perform powerful attack and generate Toughness.

Toughness is her main resource for mitigating incoming damage and surviving dangerous encounters.

talents.name: The Best Defense
talents.description:
Each time you Block an attack with your shield, you have a chance to reset the cooldown of Shield Throw and increase the damage of your next Shield Throw by 30%.
Passive: Your Threat Generation is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Shield Mastery
talents.description:
The cooldown of your Shields Up And Shield Throw abilities are reduced relative to the amount of damage you mitigate with Toughness.
Passive: Your chance to Block is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Sword & Board
talents.description:
Your Power Strike has a chance to make your next Shield Slam generate additional Toughness and have no combo points cost.
Passive: Your Power Strike and Shield Slam deal 15% increased damage.

talents.name: Aftershock
talents.description:
Enemies that take damage from your Shockwave ability deal 10% reduced damage for 9 seconds.
Passive: Your Shockwave cooldown is reduced by 20%

talents.name: Skull Cracker
talents.description:
Your Shield Throw deals 100% increased damage to the first target it hits.
Passive: Your Shield Throw's Critical Strike chance is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Front Line Defender
talents.description:
The efficiency of your Toughness mechanic is increased by 15%.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.description:
When your Toughness has reduced an amount of damage equal to 30% of your Maximum Health, you gain 20% increased Strength for 8 sec.
Passive: You take 10% less Magic damage.

talents.name: Greater Shockwave
talents.description:
Enemies that take damage from your Shockwave are stunned for 2 seconds.
Passive: Your Shockwave deals 40% increased damage.

talents.name: Gleaming Shield
talents.description:
While Shields up is active your Shield Slam deals 40% increased damage and all healing effects on you are increased by 20%.
Passive: Your Armor is increased by 20%.

lore: Helena is a stern presence within the Fellowship, maintaining a seasoned warrior’s discipline. She uses both the shield she wields to protect others, and to distance herself becoming too familiar with her companions, lest she suffer the burden of loss again.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Jubilee
abilities.description:
You send out Dream Flutterflies to protect all allies by evenly distributing all health between them every 3 seconds over 10 sec.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste and 400% Mana Regeneration for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Prickly Vine
abilities.description: Summon a Prickly Vine to continuously fling thorns at target enemy, dealing 93% Intellect damage per attack. Lasts 27 seconds.

abilities.name: Nettlebolt
abilities.description: Cast a bolt of nettles at target enemy, dealing 90% Intellect damage to them.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Heal
abilities.description:
Assign one of your Pink Flutterflies to an ally, healing them for 38% Intellect every 3 seconds until it is called away.
All healing done by Fluttercall: Heal counts as Flutterfly Healing.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Restore Life
abilities.description:
Beckon two Pink Flutterflies to dance around target ally, healing them for 186% Intellect after 2 seconds and an additional 490% Intellect over 14 seconds.
All healing done by Fluttercall: Restore Life counts as Flutterfly Healing.

abilities.name: Cure Ailment
abilities.description: Remove all Harmful Magic Effects from target ally.

abilities.name: Life Petal
abilities.description: A Life Petal sprouts up near you, healing one ally for 142% Intellect every 1 second over 10 seconds, preferring the ally with the lowest health.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Protect
abilities.description:
Send your Blue Flutterfly to protect target ally.
While your Blue Flutterfly is attached to an ally, all Flutterfly Healing done to them is increased by 300%.

abilities.name: Shroomsplosion
abilities.description:
Command all mature Boomshrooms to attack causing them to leap at target enemy and explode, dealing 243% Intellect damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Boomshrooms
Each time one of your plants expire, budding Boomshrooms start growing in that location. After 3 seconds, the Boomshroom has reached full maturity and is ready to be called into battle.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Embrace
abilities.description:
Recall your Blue Flutterfly to you.
While the Blue Flutterfly is on you, all Flutterfly Healing you do is increased by 100% and the mana cost of your abilities are reduced by 15%.

abilities.name: Heart Bloom
abilities.description:
Conjure a Heart Bloom at your side that stores 20% of all Flutterfly healing you do inside it.
Every 3 seconds, the Heart Bloom releases a pulse, healing all allies within 4000 radius for an amount equal to the healing it has stored. Lasts 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Hidden Trail
abilities.description:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.
Demure
Upon activating Hidden Trail your threat is reduced by 50% with all enemies.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Rootsap Revival
abilities.description: Command each active Prickly Vine to aid target ally, healing them for 518% intellect over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Bark Skin
abilities.description:
Target ally takes 20% reduced damage for 12 seconds.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Safe Haven
abilities.description: Place a Thornbush Blossom in target location. For the next 12 seconds, all allies standing in the radius of the Blossom take 20% reduced damage.

name: Sylvie
description:
Sylvie is a healer who uses her innate connection to nature and its many friends to heal her allies and harm her foes.

Sylvie is a Healer that uses Pet Management Mechanics. She excels at sending her pets to heal her allies over time and attack her enemies.

She commands her Flutterflies and Plants to heal, while her Boomshrooms to attack enemies.

Her powerful Heal over Time spells allow her to prepare for battle and endure long and sustained fights.

talents.name: Nettle to the Petal
talents.description:
The cooldown of your Life Petal is reduced by 2 seconds each time you deal damage with Nettlebolt and 4 seconds if it critically strikes.
Passive: Your healing is increased by 25% on players with 30% or less health.

talents.name: Synchronized Fluttering
talents.description:
Hold down Fluttercall: Heal for 2 seconds to overcharge it, causing the ability to be cast on up to 4 allies within 4000 range in one cast. The mana cost is increased by 200% when cast in this way.
Overcharged Abilities
Hold down the relevant ability button until a cast bar is displayed. Once the cast has completed, the overcharged version of the ability will trigger.
Passive: Your Fluttercall: Heal ticks 100% faster for the first 6 seconds each time it begins healing a player.

talents.name: Symbiosis
talents.description:
Your Fluttercall: Restore Life's healing is increased by 8% for each Prickly Vine you have active.
Passive: The duration of your Fluttercall: Restore Life is increased by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Sprouting Nettles
talents.description:
Each tick of Flutterfly Healing has a chance to make your next Nettlebolt Instant Cast and have 100% Critical Strike chance.
Passive: Your Nettlebolt deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Elusive Wildling
talents.description:
You take 20% reduced damage while Hidden Trail is active.
Passive: You take 10% less Area of effect damage

talents.name: Bluey's Gambit
talents.description:
While your Blue Flutterfly is following you, your movement speed is increased by 10%.
While your Blue Flutterfly is following another player, they take 5% reduced damage.
Passive: You take 10% less Magic damage.

talents.name: Bursting Petals
talents.description:
Your Life Petal's healing is front loaded, healing for twice as much on the first tick and ramping down with each tick thereafter.
Passive: The healing of your Life Petal, Heartbloom, and Rootsap Revival is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Flower Power
talents.description:
Heart Bloom has 2 charges.
Passive: Your Heart Bloom's mana cost is reduced by 30%.

talents.name: Bloomin' Boomshrooms
talents.description:
Upon detonation, each Shroomsplosion heals nearby allies for 50% Intellect.
Passive: Your Shroomsplosion deals 20% increased damage.

lore: Abandoned at a young age, Sylvie was taken in and raised by the forest itself. She spent her childhood under the protection of its boughs and learning the natural cycles of magic from her friends, the Flutterflies.

abilities.name: Wrath of Winter
abilities.description:
Invoke the spirits of the frozen tundra, causing you to passively cast a volley of Anima Spikes at enemies and generate 1 Winter Orb every 2 seconds. Lasts 20 seconds.
You deal 15% increased damage while Wrath of Winter is active.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Ice Dash
abilities.description:
Quickly travel forward a short distance.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Brain Freeze
abilities.description:
Interrupt the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec.
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Ice Comet
abilities.description: Unleash a large Ice Comet from above at target enemy, dealing 300% Intellect damage to all enemies caught in the impact radius.

abilities.name: Cold Snap
abilities.description:
Assault the target with extreme cold, dealing 204% Intellect damage.
Cold Snap triggers Anima Spikes and generates 1 Winter Orb.

abilities.name: Glacial Blast
abilities.description: Hurl a mass of ice at target enemy, dealing 504% Intellect damage.

abilities.name: Frost Bolt
abilities.description:
Hurl a bolt of water and frost at target enemy, dealing 73% Intellect damage.
Generates 3 Anima

abilities.name: Freezing Torrent
abilities.description:
Flay your target with a beam of frost energy, dealing 390% Intellect damage over 2 seconds while channeling.
Generates 1 Anima per tick up to 6 Anima when fully channeled.

abilities.name: Bursting Ice
abilities.description:
Conjures an icy crystal inside a target that periodically erupts, dealing 366% Intellect damage to the target and nearby enemies over 3 seconds.
Bursting Ice generates 1 Anima per enemy hit up to a maximum of 3 Anima each tick.

abilities.name: Frost Ward
abilities.description:
You take 40% reduced damage for 4 seconds.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Ice Blitz
abilities.description:
You enter a state of focused casting for 20 seconds, causing each Anima you generate to instantly shoot out an Anima Spike at your target.
You deal 15% increased damage while Ice Blitz is active.
Can be used during Global Cooldown and while casting

abilities.name: Frigid Winds
abilities.description: Blast enemies in front of you with arctic winds, Knocking Back enemies and Slowing them by 50% for 12 sec.

abilities.name: Dance of Swallows
abilities.description:
Summon a flock of swallows that circle above target enemy for 20 seconds. Your Cold Snap and Freezing Torrent will command the Ice Swallows to swoop down on the targeted enemy dealing 53% Intellect per hit.
Ice Swallows benefit from and trigger all effects that Anima Spikes do.

abilities.name: Winter's Blessing
abilities.description:
Your Spirit is increased by 20% for 15 seconds and damage you deal is replicated as healing divided equally between all allies.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

name: Rime
description:
Channelling the forces of spirit and ice, Rime conjures powerful spells to decimate her foes.

Rime is a Spellcasting Damage Dealer with Builder/Spender Mechanics. She excels at focusing down the biggest threat from a distance.

Many of Rime’s abilities fill an Anima Bar to deal spikes of damage and generate Winter Orbs.

She uses Winter Orbs to cast dangerous spells.

talents.name: Chillblain
talents.description:
Your Freezing Torrent deals 20% of its damage each tick to up to 5 additional enemies near the target.
Passive: Your Freezing Torrent deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Coalescing Ice
talents.description:
When Bursting Ice deals damage to a single target it generates 2 additional Anima.
Passive: Your Bursting Ice damage is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Glacial Assault
talents.description:
Your Coldsnap ability causes you to gain 1 stack of Glacial Assault up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
At 5 stacks, your next Glacial Blast is instant cast and deals 100% increased damage.
Passive: Your Glacial Blast has 20% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Unrelenting Ice
talents.description:
Each tick of Freezing Torrent reduces the cooldown of Bursting Ice by 0.5 seconds.
Passive: You take 10% less Area of Effect damage.

talents.name: Icy Flow
talents.description:
Each of your Anime Spike hits reduce the cooldown of Freezing Torrent by 0.2 seconds.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Avalanche
talents.description:
Ice Comet has a 30% chance to strike twice, and an 8% chance to strike three times.
Passive: Your Critical Strike Power is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Tundra Guard
talents.description:
Your Frost Ward duration is increased by 2 seconds and while it is active, you heal for 50% of all damage you deal.
Passive: You take 10% reduced Magic damage.

talents.name: Wisdom of the North
talents.description:
The cooldown of Ice Blitz, Dance of Swallows & Winter's blessing is reduced by 1 second for each Winter's Orb you spend.
Passive: Your Ice Blitz increases all damage you deal by an additional 10%.

talents.name: Soulfrost Torrent
talents.description:
Your Critical Strikes have a chance to make your next Freezing Torrent's channel duration twice as long and increase the damage of each tick. A full channel with Soulfrost Torrent active will amount to 300% increased damage and generate 12 Anima.
Passive: Your Anima Spikes have 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

lore: Blessed or maybe cursed by the spirits of the land, Rime was given the the ability to manipulate the flows of Anima around her. A skill that her tribe thought lost to their past. She uses this ability to manipulate the water and ice around her, teaching her enemies to respect the elemental forces.

abilities.name: Avatar of Light
abilities.description:
Instantly heal all allies within a large radius of you for 280% Intellect and enter an enlightened state for 9 sec, enhancing your abilities.
Radiant Blast
Deals 50% increased damage and has no Cooldown.
Heal
Costs 50% less Mana and is Instant Cast.
Circle of Light
Costs 50% less Mana and has no Cooldown.

SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste and 400% Mana Regeneration for 20 sec.

abilities.name: Dawnflare
abilities.description:
Deals 90% Intellect damage to target enemy.
Each cast of Dawnflare generates 20% of a Radiant Rune.
Vigour can call upon the light to unleash a flare of divine light from above. This flash of radiant energy strikes the enemy with a sharp but controlled force.

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description:
Within a cone in front of you, allies are healed for 123% Intellect and enemies take 87% Intellect damage.
When Radiant Blast deals damage to any number of enemies, it generates 50% of a Radiant Rune.
Vigour expels an explosive flash of divine light from his outstretched hand, healing allies in its path, while searing enemies with its blinding brilliance.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description:
Heal target ally for 791% Intellect.
Vigour opens his sacred tome, drawing forth radiant power inscribed within its pages. With a solemn gesture, he calls forth a burst of healing energy to mend even the deepest wounds.

abilities.name: Circle of Light
abilities.description:
Place a Circle of Light on the ground, instantly healing all allies within its radius for 487% Intellect.
Vigour calls upon the power of light to create a circle of divine healing on the ground. Allies within its boundaries are restored in a sudden flash, as the light pours into them, mending their wounds.

abilities.name: Remove Magic
abilities.description: Remove all Harmful Magic Effects from target ally.

abilities.name: Soulbrand
abilities.description:
Deal 594% Intellect damage over 24 sec to target enemy.
Soulbrand generates 50% of a Radiant Rune over its duration.
Vigour inscribes a searing rune onto the soul of his enemy, infusing it with radiant energy. The rune pulses painfully, steadily draining their life force while fueling Vigour’s power.

abilities.name: Rune of Renewal
abilities.description:
Instantly heal target ally for 594% Intellect and apply Rune of Renewal on them for 30 seconds, causing all your direct healing effects on that ally to echo for an additional 25% of the initial heal's value.
The bonus healing generated by Rune of Renewal generates Radiant Rune power relative to the value of the heal.
Vigour inscribes a resonating rune onto the spirit of an ally. When Vigor heals that ally, the rune pulses gently, further mending any wounds that linger as its light nourishes the body and spirit.

abilities.name: Luminous Barrier
abilities.description:
Apply a shield to target ally that absorbs up to 1175% Intellect damage while it persists. The shield lasts for 8 sec.
Vigour inscribes a rune of protection onto an ally, causing light to be woven around them into a barrier of divine energy. The barrier stops all forms of attack, whether forged by steel or conjured by magic.

abilities.name: Dawnbreaker Orb
abilities.description:
Conjure an orb of light that slowly travels forward, healing all allies it touches for 310% Intellect and damaging enemies for 265% Intellect.
Each ally and enemy touched by Dawnbreaker Orb generates 10% of a Radiant Rune.
Vigour conjures an orb of intricate runes, humming with radiant power. The orb shines brilliantly as it slowly drifts forward, burning all darkness from its path and bolstering the lifeforce of Vigour's allies.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description:
Your movement speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.
Levitation
You take 20% reduced Area of Effect damage while levitating.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Runic Proliferation
abilities.description:
Instantly generate 3 Radiant Runes. For the next 8 seconds, any Rune Abilities you cast are empowered, increasing their effectiveness by 20%.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Lightshaper's Ward
abilities.description:
Target ally takes 20% reduced damage for 12 seconds.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

name: Vigour
description:
As a dwarf who divines the true meaning of runes, Vigour wields powerful healing spells to bolster and protect his allies and smite his enemies.

Vigour is a Healer that uses Builder/Spender Mechanics. He excels in the middle of his allies where he can sustain them with powerful AoE heals.

As a wielder of Radiant Runes, he must choose how and when to cast his most powerful spells.

His strong Direct Healing grant him an advantage in reacting to an ever-changing battlefield.

talents.name: Epiphany
talents.description:
Your Dawnflare, Soulbrand & Radiant Blast have a 15% chance to make your next Heal instant cast and cost 50% less Mana.
Epiphany stacks up to 3 times.
Passive: Your Dawnflare deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Enduring Light
talents.description:
The healing of your Circle of Light is increased by up to 50% depending on the amount of health the target is missing. Lower health gives a larger bonus.
Passive: Your Circle of Light's mana cost is reduced by 25%.

talents.name: Ruptured Soul
talents.description:
When an enemy dies while Soulbrand is active on them you instantly gain 50% of the Rune Power it would have generated in the time that was remaining and trigger an explosion dealing 50% of the damage that was remaining to all nearby enemies.
Passive: Your Soulbrand deals 15% increased damage.

talents.name: Beacon in the Dark
talents.description:
Each time Soulbrand deals damage you have a chance to reset the cooldown of Radiant Blast and make your next Radiant Blast have 100% critical strike chance.
Passive: Your Radiant Blast healing is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Sacred Barrier
talents.description:
Allies under the effects of Luminous Barrier take 10% reduced damage.
Passive: You take 10% less Magic damage.

talents.name: Expansive Mind
talents.description:
Your Dawnflare casts have a chance to grant you Expansive Mind, increasing your expertise by 10% for 16 seconds and replenishing 8% of your mana over the duration..
Passive: Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Master of Triage
talents.description:
Each time you generate a Radiant Rune, a free Heal of 50% efficiency is cast on a nearby ally, preferring the player with lowest health.
Passive: Greater Heal has 0.5s reduced cast time.

talents.name: Meticulous Runesmith
talents.description:
Your Dawnbreaker Orb costs 1 less Radiant Rune.
Passive:
Your Dawnbreaker Orb healing and damage is increased by 20%

talents.name: Grand Design
talents.description:
Your Soulbrand, Rune of Renewal & Luminous Barrier abilities can now be Overcharged, causing the ability to be cast on up to 4 applicable targets at once at the cost of 3 Radiant Runes.
Requires 3 Radiant Runes.
Overcharged Abilities
Hold down the relevant ability button until a cast bar is displayed. Once the cast has completed, the overcharged version of the ability will trigger.
Known issue: Soulbrand currently only applies on multiplie targets when those enemies are in combat with you
Passive:
Your Soulbrand, Rune of Renewal & Luminous Barrier have 20% increased duration.

lore: Vigour taps into the very essence of light with ease—a power he uses to defend those in need from the many forms of darkness that seek to corrupt the world. His sacred duty is not only to heal the wounded but also to strike down those who would use shadows to harm the innocent.

abilities.name: Raging Tempest
abilities.description:
You gain an enhanced version of Thunder Call for 20 seconds.
Raging Currents
In addition to its normal effects, Raging Currents strike a random nearby enemy every 0.5 seconds dealing 66% Strength lightning damage. Each time Raging Currents hits an enemy your Critical Strike chance is increased by 1.5%, stacking up to 20 times.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Heavy Strike
abilities.description:
When Heavy Strike is queued up, your next Auto Attack deals 240% increased damage.
Swing Timer
Your swing timer is displayed as a bar to the right of your hero. When you see the red area light up on the swing timer it is time to queue your Heavy Strike and wait for it to finish.
Queueing Heavy Strike
Heavy Strike's queue is displayed as a golden border around the ability icon on your action bar. The queue is canceled when you use any other ability, so make sure the last button you press before the swing timer reaches the end of the red area is Heavy Strike.

Thunder Call
Heavy Strike also charges the ground in front of you with lightning, dealing 157% Strength damage to enemies near the target.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt
Can be queued during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Wild Swing
abilities.description:
Swing your hammer in a wide arc toward target enemy dealing 62% Strength damage them and any nearby enemies.
Recklessness
- Enemies have an increased chance to Dodge Wild Swing.
- Wild Swing cannot Critically Strike.
- Damage of Wild Swing is increased by an amount equal to your Critical Strike chance percentage.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt

abilities.name: Face Breaker
abilities.description:
Instantly attack target enemy dealing 275% Strength damage.
Face Breaker can only be used after one of your attacks Misses or is Dodged by an enemy.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Skull Crusher
abilities.description:
Instantly deal 340% Strength damage to target enemy.
Skull Crusher resets the Swing Timer
Thunder Call
Skull Crusher beckons a thunder bolt to strike the target from above, dealing 272% Strength damage.

abilities.name: Hammer Storm
abilities.description:
Spin with your Hammer, dealing up to 224% Strength damage over 2.8 seconds to all nearby enemies.
Hammer Storm has an initial cost of 26 Fury, and an additional 8 Fury every 0.7 seconds until you have spent a maximum of 50 Fury per use.
Hammer Storm resets the Swing Timer
Thunder Call
Hammer Storm causes lightning to strike you as you spin, shocking enemies hit for an additional 180% Strength damage over 2.8 seconds.

abilities.name: Pummel
abilities.description:
Instantly interrupt target enemy's spell cast, and silence them for 4 seconds.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Thunder Call
abilities.description:
Call on Thunder to charge your hammer with immense power, enhancing your abilities for 20 seconds.
Generates 25 Fury
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description:
Conjure an arc of lightning onto target enemy that chains between you and other enemies until it has dealt damage 5 times. Each hit of Chain Lightning deals 85% Strength damage.
Chain Lightning does not deal damage to you.
Thunder Call
Chain Lightning requires you to have Thunder Call active.
Generates Fury relative to damage dealt

abilities.name: Leap Smash
abilities.description:
Instantly Leap to target area and smash the ground, dealing 290% Strength damage to all nearby enemies.
Generates 25 Fury
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description:
You take 40% reduced damage for 4 seconds.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Focused Wrath
abilities.description:
Your next two casts of Skull Crusher or Hammer Storm cost 50% less Fury and deal 30% increased damage.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description:
Instantly intimidate up to 8 enemies around you for 10 seconds.
If an Intimidated enemy takes damage equal to 1000% of your Strength, they will break out of the effect.

abilities.name: Culling Strike
abilities.description:
Instantly deal 150% Strength damage to target enemy. Culling Strike spends up to 20 Fury, increasing its damage by 15% for each Fury spent up to 300%.
Execution
Can only be used against enemies that have 30% or less health.

name: Tariq
description:
Tariq channels storm and fury to deal immense damage to his enemies.

Tariq is a Melee Damage Dealer that uses Builder/Spender and Timing Mechanics. He excels in the front lines to flank his enemies while they face the Tank.

Timing his abilities around his Swing Timer will maximize his damage and Fury generation.

Fury is required for Tariq to perform powerful attacks.

talents.name: Left Hand Path
talents.description:
Face Breaker has 50% additional Critical Strike chance.
Passive: Your Face Breaker deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Far Beyond Driven
talents.description:
Heavy Strike increases your Spirit by 2% for 12 seconds, stacking up to 10 times.
Passive: Your swing timer is 50% faster.

talents.name: Square Hammer
talents.description:
Wild Swing, Face Breaker, Leap Smash & Chain Lightning increase the damage of your next Heavy Strike by 12%, stacking up to 5 times.
Passive: Your Critical Strike Power is increased by 8%.

talents.name: Pneuma
talents.description:
You take 10% reduced damage while performing Hammer Storm.
Passive: You take 10% less damage from Area of Effect attacks.

talents.name: Bloodline
talents.description:
Your Fury Generation is increased by 10%.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%

talents.name: Mouth for War
talents.description:
Your Unbreakable Will duration is increased by 4 seconds.
While Unbreakable Will is active, the ability is swapped out for "Taunt", allowing you to force target enemy to attack you for 8 seconds.
Passive: You take 10% reduced Magic damage.

talents.name: Ride the Lightning
talents.description:
Thunder Call generates 60 additional Fury over 20 seconds.
Passive: Your Lightning damage has 25% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Schism
talents.description:
Your Skull Crusher has a chance to make your next Hammer Storm deal 300% increased damage.
Your Hammer Storm has a chance to make your next Skull Crusher deal 300% increased damage.

talents.name: Blood & Thunder
talents.description:
Your Heavy Strike has a chance to cast a free Chain Lightning at the target.
Passive: Your Chain Lightning damage is increased by 20%.

lore: Tariq comes from a long line of champions. He is strong of hand and stronger of heart. He lived a simple life of calm and peace, but one fateful day, his partner and child were lost in the wars of the Clans.

abilities.name: Twin Souls: Army of One
abilities.description:
You split your soul into the Sibling of Wind and the Sibling of Earth for 10 seconds.
SIBLING OF EARTH (controlled)
While Twin Souls: Army of One is active, the Sibling of Earth takes 40% reduced damage.
SIBLING OF WIND
The Sibling of Wind swiftly teleports to, and strikes, nearby enemies up to 40 times dealing 92% agility damage with each strike.
SPIRIT ABILITY
When you activate your Spirit ability you gain Spirit of Heroism, granting +30% Haste for 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Spirit Palm
abilities.description:
Deals 40% Agility damage to target enemy.
Grants access to Palm Technique finishers.
Combo Builder

abilities.name: Wind Kick
abilities.description:
Deals 20% Agility damage to your target and other enemies near your target.
Grants access to Kick Technique finishers.
Combo Builder

abilities.name: Earth Fist
abilities.description:
Deals 40% Agility damage to target enemy.
Grants access to Fist Technique finishers.
Combo Builder

abilities.name: Fighting Techniques
abilities.description:
Grants access to Finishing Moves based on Combo Builders used:
Finisher Techniques can be used during Global Cooldown
PALM TECHNIQUES
Spirited Strikes
• Grants +10% Magic Damage reduction & +5% Parry for 15 sec.
Spirited Vortex
• Conjures a Vortex around you that provides +5% Dodge and deals damage to nearby enemies over 18 sec.
KICK TECHNIQUES
Rising Storm
• Deals damage to the target and grants 2 Stormfall charges, increasing the damage of your next 2 Lashing Stormkicks by 100%.
Lashing Stormkick
• Deals damage to target and nearby enemies nearby. Heals you for 200% of the damage it deals.
FIST TECHNIQUES
Rising Earth
• Deals damage to the target and grants 2 Earthfall charges, increasing the damage of your next 2 Earthfist Barrages by 100%.
Earthfist Barrage
• Pummels target enemy over 2 seconds and heals you for 200% of the damage it deals.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description:
Taunt the target, forcing it to attack you for 6 sec.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description:
Quickly travel forward a short distance.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Stagger
abilities.description:
Interrupt the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec.
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Stone Shield
abilities.description:
Summon 3 protective stones around you that spin in a wide circle, dealing 250% Agility damage to all nearby enemies.
Each stone increases armor by 35%, up to a maximum of 105%.
While at least one is active, the stones soak 35% of all damage you take. When a stone has soaked damage equal to 1200% Agility it breaks, causing you to lose the Armor bonus provided by that stone.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Rising Storm
abilities.description:
Perform a powerful jump kick, dealing 80% Agility damage to your target and nearby enemies. Damage is reduced beyond 3 targets. Grants you 2 charges of Stormfall.
Stormfall
Your next Lashing Stormkick deals 100% increased damage.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Lashing Stormkick
abilities.description:
Perform a roundhouse kick, dealing 34% Agility damage to your target and nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 3 targets.
Lashing Stormkick heals you for 200% of the damage it deals.
Stormfall
Using Lashing Stormkick will consume 1 Stormfall and increase its damage by 100%.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Rising Earth
abilities.description:
Uppercut target enemy, dealing 126% Agility. Grants you 2 charges of Earthfall.
Earthfall
Your next Earthfist Barrage deals 100% increased damage.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Double Palm Strike
abilities.description:
Strike target enemy with both palms, dealing 130% Agility damage. Grants Spirited Strikes for 15 seconds.
SPIRITED STRIKES
+20% Magic Damage Reduction
+5% Parry
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Earthfist Barrage
abilities.description:
Pummel your target for 42% Agility damage while channeling over 1.5 seconds, ending with an uppercut that deals 42% Agility damage. Meiko can Move while channeling Earthfist Barrage.
Earthfist Barrage heals you for 100% of the damage it deals.
Affected by Earthfall
Using Earthfist Barrage will consume 1 Earthfall and increase its damage by 100%.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Spirited Vortex
abilities.description:
Meiko creates a vortex of winds around her, providing +5% Dodge Chance and dealing 30% Agility damage to all nearby enemies every 2 sec for 18 sec.
Can be used during Global Cooldown

abilities.name: Shatter Earth
abilities.description: Leap and slam the ground at a target location, dealing 310% Agility damage to all enemies in the area and leaving an area of quaking earth that deals 276% Agility damage over 6 seconds to any enemy standing in in the effect.

abilities.name: Serenity
abilities.description:
Instantly heal yourself for 140% Agility.
Each time you Auto Attack an enemy, your Serenity healing is increased by 30%, stacking up to 50 times.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Create a Cyclone of strong winds that instantly pulls in all enemies within the radius to you.

abilities.name: Twin Souls: Bulwark
abilities.description:
Split your soul into the Sibling of Wind and the Sibling of Earth for up to 20 seconds.
SIBLING OF WIND (controlled)
The Sibling of Wind takes 20% of any damage dealt to the Sibling of Earth..
SIBLING OF EARTH
The Sibling of Earth taunts all enemies in a 1000 radius around them every 1.5 seconds. If the Sibling of Earth is destroyed before the duration ends, Twin Souls: Bulwark ends.

abilities.name: Stone Stomp
abilities.description: Send a shockwave through the ground in front of you, dealing 476% Agility damage to enemies in its wake and Stunning them for 3 sec.

name: Meiko
description:
As a martial artist, Meiko utilizes a variety of fighting techniques to empower herself and defend her allies.

Meiko is a Melee Tank that uses Ability Combo Mechanics. She excels in the front lines taking hits instead of her allies.

She uses Ability Combos to perform powerful Finishing Moves.

Big cooldowns and self buffs allow her to mend her own wounds and survive dangerous attacks.

talents.name: Earthwell
talents.description:
Each hit with Earthfist Barrage adds 1 Serenity charge.
Passive: Your Earth abilities deal 10% increased damage

talents.name: Resonance of Earth
talents.description:
When you activate Stone Shield you take 20% reduced damage for 8 seconds.
Passive: Your Threat Generation is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Thunder Kick
talents.description:
Your Lashing Stormkick has a 50% chance to deal damage an additional time for 30% of the initial hit.
Passive:
Your Lashing Stormkick has 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Slipstream
talents.description:
Each time you cast Gust you release a burst of winds at your starting location, causing all enemies within 750 radius to have 50% reduced movement speed for 6 seconds.
Passive: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Spirited Advance
talents.description:
Your Shatter Earth now also activates your Spirited Strikes and Spirited Vortex buffs.
Passive: You take 10% less Magic Damage.

talents.name: Harsh Winds
talents.description:
Enemies hit by Spirited Vortex have 20% reduced Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
Passive: Your Spirited Vortex damage is increased by 10%

talents.name: Serene Resillience
talents.description:
Your Serenity applies 1% damage reduction for 8 seconds per stack consumed but its healing is reduced by 50%.
Passive: Your Serenity ability has 20% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Earthbourne
talents.description:
Your Shatter Earth now has 2 charges and each cast of Shatter Earth reduces the cooldown of Twin Souls: Bulwark by 15%.
Passive:
The health and duration of your Twin Souls: Bulwark sibling is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Forbidden Technique
talents.description:
Your Double Palm Strike finisher applies Forbidden Technique to the target for 15 seconds.
Forbidden Technique accumulates 10% of all damage you deal to the target. Once it expires, is removed, or if the enemy dies while it is active - you are healed for the accumulated amount and the same amount explodes outward to all nearby enemies in an 800 radius.
You can only have one Forbidden Technique active at any time.
Passive:
Your Finishers have 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

lore: Evil destroyed her home and her purpose, now only she remains. Meiko cannot undo what has happened to her people, but she can avenge them. That will be her purpose now.
